title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 328.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 328.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Chairman refers
to the chairman of the Workers' Compensation Board of the State of New

York. (b) Medical society refers to
the appropriate county medical society, unless the claimant's physician is an
osteopath, in which case medical society refers to either the appropriate
county medical society or the New York State Osteopathic Society, Inc. (c) Carrier refers to the
employer or his insurer. (d) Rating
board refers to the New York Compensation Insurance Rating Board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
328.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
